= Components =

|| *Component Code* || *Component Name* || *Function* || *Class* || *Comments* ||
|| *VBA.RT* || Retina || Spatial decorrelation through center surround inhibition || SSA || 100:1 cones/rods to ganglion cells aggregation ||
|| *VBA.SC* || Superior Colliculus || Direct behavioral responses toward specific points in egocentric space, <BR>induce saccadic eye movement || SSC || Superficial layers are sensory-related, <BR>deep layers are motor-related ||
|| *VBA.TH.LGN* || Lateral Geniculate Nucleus || Temporal decorrelation || SSR || Only 10% of inputs to LGN come from the retina. <BR>90% are modulatory inputs from cortex and the brainstem ||
|| *VBA.TH.IPV* || Inferior Pulvinar || Dorsal "Where" Stream || SSR || Thalamus ||
|| *VBA.TH.LPV* || Lateral Pulvinar || Ventral "What" Stream || SSR || Thalamus ||
|| *VBA.TH.MPV* || Medial Pulvinar || Integration of associative cortical information and projects to visuomotor-related cortex || SSC || CG, PMC, PFC connections ||
|| *VBA.TCH* || Trochlea Nucleus || Change Eye Direction || GSE || Muscle nucleus ||
|| *VBA.OCN* || Oculomotor Nucleus || Change Eye Direction || GSE || Muscle nucleus ||
|| *VBA.EWN* || Edinger-Westphal Nucleus || Change Eye Pupil || GVE || Muscle nucleus, parvocellular part of OCN ||
|| *VBA.ABD* || Abducens Nucleus || Conjugated movements of both eyes || GSE, GSR || Motoneurons - to muscle, interneurons - to OCN ||
